document_data.caption: Telshambra's Street on a circa. [[1492 DR]] map
document_data.name: Telshambra's Street
document_data.ends: [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Telshambra's Street''' was a road paved in hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]], that stood on the boundary line of the city of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] and [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]].
document_data.Geography: This road ran from east to west, spanning between the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]. Along the way it acted as the southern terminus of [[Blackmul Street]] and the terminus for both ends of the curving [[Ilisar's Alley]].

Notable Locations.Blackstone House (Waterdeep)|Blackstone: A rowhouse on the corner of Telshambra's Street and the Way of the Dragon.<ref>
Notable Locations.Stone House (Waterdeep)|The Stone House: Guildhall of the [[Carpenters', Roofers', & Plaisterers' Guild]].
